abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project constitutes the
            bulk of Kenya's livestock development program for the
            next five years. This broadly-based integrated livestock
            development program which reflects the Government's
            strategy for developing this subsector is designed to
            support all aspects of beef production and marketing and
            includes elements specifically tailored to benefit the
            traditional small livestock owners, to enhance export
            earnings and to ameliorate the inherent conflict between
            ranching development and wildlife conservation.
